title: "Viral Wallpapers"
content:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to our website featuring a unique collection of wallpapers that will make your desktop stand out. Our wallpapers are designed with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a black background.

Our website offers a wide range of high-quality wallpapers that are perfect for adding a touch of style to your computer screen. Whether you're looking for a wallpaper that's bold and striking or something more subtle and understated, we have something for everyone.

Our wallpapers are carefully crafted to ensure that they look great on any screen size and resolution. We also regularly update our collection with new designs, so be sure to check back often to see what's new.

So why settle for a boring, generic wallpaper when you can have something truly unique? Browse our collection today and find the perfect wallpaper to give your desktop a fresh new look!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
